1073730.name: Sanator: A Cart of Rarities
1073730.description:
Salve, friends!


Want to see the Sanators unmasked, discover the secrets of the Brotherhood initiation or find out what the Nocturnals look like? The “Cart Of Rarities” DLC is something special. Here's what you will find inside:



  • Illustrated concept book

More than 90 unique art pieces drawn during the development stage: characters, surroundings, weapons. Developer commentary included!

  • “Sanator: Awakening” short story

We saved this work specifically for the Steam release.
The story tells of the first meeting between Richard and Anga, which occurs in Kerneberg — the capital of Tentaria and the heart of St. Elmo Brotherhood.

  • Guide to Reustadt

Essay on the history of Reustadt with illustrated area descriptions — a great find for a collector.

  • The expanded soundtrack

Includes music from “Sanator: Chronicles of Reustadt” and “Tentarian Road” EP in high quality.

  • Wallpaper pack

Modest bonus — 12 high resolution images, which may become a worthy decoration for your desktop.
